body: If this notation is included in the skill name line, you must have at least 1 rank in the skill to use it. If this notation is omitted, the skill can be used untrained (with a rank of 0). If any special notes apply to trained or untrained use, they are covered in the Untrained section (see below).
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Using Skills/Skill Descriptions/Skill Name/Trained Only
name: Trained Only
